channel.title: Ecto Radio
channel.description: Paranormal and Horror Talk radio! Playing only Metal, rock and paranormal oriented programs! Get your Ghost on" with Ecto Radio! Ecto Radio; featuring the Hitman, Bob the Sane, Racer and Zero Voorhees. With over 30 years of combined experience, their show has a focus on the scientific and logical study of paranormal with their warped sense of humor thrown in to produce an informative, yet entertaining program.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Ecto Radio
channel.itunes:summary: Ecto Radio. Horror and paranormal topics.
channel.itunes:author: Ecto Radio
channel.itunes:keywords: paranormal, ghosts, ecto, hitman, sgha, ghost hunters,Horror, Horror movies, reviews

item.title: Episode 189; Dr. Barry Taff Interview
item.description: In this episode we interview Dr. Barry Taff, who holds a doctorate in psychophysiology with a minor in biomedical engineering, is a world-renowned parapsychologist who worked out of UCLA’s former parapsychology laboratory from 1969 through 1978 as a research associate. During his 43-year career, Dr. Taff has investigated more than 4,500 cases of ghosts, hauntings, poltergeists and conducted extensive studies in telepathy and precognition, which led to the development of the initial protocols and methodologies for what was later termed remote viewing.
item.itunes:subtitle: Dr. Barry Taff Interview

item.title: Episode 22 "The truth about the Santa Fe Pen " (Download)
item.description: Hitman and Bob interview Marcella Armijo, the 1st female captain in the OldState Pen. Started in 1976 and worked till late early 90's and was one of the first ones in after the 1980 riot to identify bodies and then clean-up crew . Considered to be the bloodiest riot in U.S. history, the truth has been obscured by people who were not there and by bad information presented in books like the "Devil's Butcher shop" and "The Hate Factory". Now a direct eyewitness to the events tells it like it really was and dispels several rumors and stories surrounding the old pen.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 22 "The truth about the Santa Fe Pen " (Download)
